title: Ninja Crispi 4-in-1 Portable Glass Air Fryer Cooking System
description: Brand new, unused, unopened, and undamaged Ninja Crispi 4-in-1 Portable Glass Air Fryer Cooking System in its original packaging. Features a clear glass basket for easy viewing and is perfect for air frying, roasting, baking, and reheating. Compact, lightweight, and portable—ideal for on-the-go cooking. Key specifications: Maximum timer setting of 100 min, electric power source, temperature range from 100°F to 450°F, 4 qt oil capacity, 2-6 qt total capacity, 1500 W power, 120 V voltage, and 4 cooking programs. Model FN101GY in Cyberspace color, made of glass, includes basket, and manufactured in China. Dimensions: 11.97 in depth, 13.39 in width, 13.58 in height, and weighs 15.74 lb. Sealed and ready to ship.
